content: simple minimal sew woodlouse pattern materials - chosen yarn i used two strands of a vintage 3ply yarn and 3mm hook as well as a super chunky yarn and 8mm hook for two different sized woodlice - crochet hook - stitch marker to mark beginning/end of row - yarn needle - scissors - safety eyes use whatever size you want your woodlouse to have - toy stuffing or you could use scrap yarn/yarn ends to stuff
